Text:
I finally got this whole fuckin' thing 100% and now I will keep seeding for a few more days. 

I had to go to another site and get a different torrent, one with actual seeders on it, and since they were the same files I copied 95.9% of this torrent into the new one and let it finish. then I copied the 100% completed files into this torrent and WOO-HOOOOOO!!! Now All you poor suckers who have been stuck like me at 95.9% for a month can finally get the whole thing.

A HEX on you Travelo2008 for not seeding your own torrent.
Please, it's a great game, i think, help me to finish it ;-)
